attributes.action: Scrap the newly imposed Air Passenger Duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap the Air Passenger Duty as the money accrued from this is doing little or nothing to improve the effects of Global Warming.  The British public pay enough in taxes as it is.  Having a holiday every year (for those who can afford) is expensive enough without adding to the cost with pointless taxes, this is all some people have to look forward to each year. Some of the money that is spent on war could be diverted and spent to improve the world.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the newly imposed Air Passenger Duty."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12851.asp

Prime Minister's Office
